summary: when you start the game there will be a chest in the helgen keep with dragon armor and some weapons. if you have the alternate start mod just travel to helgen and kill the few bandits there enter the keep and find the chest.
descriptionHtml: when you start the game there will be a chest in the helgen keep with dragon armor and some weapons. if you have the alternate start mod just travel to helgen and kill the few bandits there enter the keep and find the chest.
